com.anifichadia.toolkit.random

Class Randomiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.random.Randomiser

  • public class Randomiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the Random class to perform various random number generation methods.

    Note: May not be thread safe. Uses a single, static Random object
    Author:
    Aniruddh Fichadia | Email: Ani.Fichadia@gmail.com | GitHub Username: AniFichadia (http://github.com/AniFichadia)

    • Method Detail

      • randInt

        public static int randInt()
        Generates a randomly generated integer
        Returns:
        A pseudo randomly generated integer.

      • randIntBetween

        public static int randIntBetween(int start,
                 int endExclusive)
        Generates a random integer between a requested range. Value will be in range: [start, endExclusive)
        Parameters:
        start - Minimum number to generate
        endExclusive - Maximum number to generate, excluding the value. Just add 1 to the value to include
        Returns:
        Random integer in range [start, endExclusive)

      • randFloat

        public static float randFloat()
        Generates a randomly generated float
        Returns:
        A pseudo randomly generated float.

      • randFloatBetween

        public static float randFloatBetween(float start,
                     float endExclusive)
        Generates a random float between a requested range. Value will be in range: [start, endExclusive)
        Parameters:
        start - Minimum number to generate
        endExclusive - Maximum number to generate, excluding the value. Just add 1 to the value to include
        Returns:
        Random float in range [start, endExclusive)

      • randDouble

        public static double randDouble()
        Generates a randomly generated double
        Returns:
        A pseudo randomly generated double.

      • randDoubleBetween

        public static double randDoubleBetween(double start,
                       double endExclusive)
        Generates a random double between a requested range. Value will be in range: [start, endExclusive)
        Parameters:
        start - Minimum number to generate
        endExclusive - Maximum number to generate, excluding the value. Just add 1 to the value to include
        Returns:
        Random double in range [start, endExclusive)

      • randNormal

        public static double randNormal(double mean,
                double stddev)
        Generates a random number using a normal distribution and the provided mean and standard deviations
        Parameters:
        mean - Mean to use for normal distribution
        stddev - Standard deviation to use for normal distribution
        Returns:
        random Number using a normal distribution and the provided mean and standard deviations

      • randStdNormal

        public static double randStdNormal()
        Refer to randNormal(double, double)

        Uses defaults for a "standard" normal distribution (mean of 0.0, standard deviation of 1.0)

      • randBoolean

        public static boolean randBoolean()
        Generates a random boolean value
        Returns:
        A random boolean value

      • mathRandInt

        public static int mathRandInt(int max)
        Generates a random number between 0 and the specified maximum. This does not use the Random class, but instead uses the Math.random() method.
        Parameters:
        max - Max number to generate, inclusive
        Returns:
        number in range [0, max]

      • setSeed

        public static void setSeed(long seed)
        Refer to Random.setSeed(long)
